se.umu.jayo0002.iremind.view_models

Class TaskViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
      • androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
        • se.umu.jayo0002.iremind.view_models.TaskViewModel

  • public class TaskViewModel
extends androidx.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
    TaskViewModel prepares and provides data for the UI. It communicates with the TaskRepo. It extends the AndroidViewModel.
    Since:
    2019 -12-09
